rmi.client

Class RmiClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • rmi.client.RmiClientController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.rmi.Remote, IClientController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientGameController

    public abstract class RmiClientController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClientController, java.io.Closeable
    an abstract implementation of a java rmi battleships client

    rverbist

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect(java.lang.String host,
           int port,
           java.lang.String name)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.rmi.NotBoundException
        connects to the server at the given host:port as a player with the given name
        Parameters:
        host - the host name of the server
        port - the port of the server
        name - the name of the player to connect as
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the java rmi service could not be started
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - if the java rmi service is not running on the server
